00018 #ifndef __TLM_TARGET_SOCKET_H__
00019 #define __TLM_TARGET_SOCKET_H__
00020 
00021 //#include <systemc>
00022 #include "tlm_h/tlm_trans/tlm_2_interfaces/tlm_fw_bw_ifs.h"
00023 
00024 
00025 namespace tlm {
00026 
00027 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH,
00028           typename FW_IF,
00029           typename BW_IF> class tlm_initiator_socket;
00030 
00031 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00032           typename FW_IF = tlm_fw_nb_transport_if<>,
00033           typename BW_IF = tlm_bw_nb_transport_if<> >
00034 class tlm_target_socket : public sc_core::sc_export<FW_IF>
00035 {
00036 public:
00037   typedef FW_IF                                 fw_interface_type;
00038   typedef BW_IF                                 bw_interface_type;
00039   typedef sc_core::sc_port<bw_interface_type>   port_type;
00040   typedef sc_core::sc_export<fw_interface_type> export_type;
00041   typedef tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00042                                fw_interface_type,
00043                                bw_interface_type>  initiator_socket_type;
00044 
00045   friend class tlm_initiator_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00046                                     fw_interface_type,
00047                                     bw_interface_type>;
00048 
00049 public:
00050   tlm_target_socket(const char* name)
00051   : export_type(name)
00052   , mPort(sc_core::sc_gen_unique_name((std::string(name) + "_port").c_str()))
00053   {
00054   }
00055 
00056   unsigned int get_bus_width() const
00057   {
00058     return BUSWIDTH;
00059   }
00060 
00061   //
00062   // Bind target socket to initiator socket
00063   // - Binds the port of the initiator socket to the export of the target
00064   //   socket
00065   // - Binds the port of the target socket to the export of the initiator
00066   //   socket
00067   //
00068   void bind(initiator_socket_type& s)
00069   {
00070     // initiator.port -> target.export
00071     (*static_cast<typename initiator_socket_type::port_type*>(&s))(*static_cast<export_type*>(this));
00072     // target.port -> initiator.export
00073     mPort(s.mExport);
00074   }
00075 
00076   void operator() (initiator_socket_type& s)
00077   {
00078     bind(s);
00079   }
00080 
00081   //
00082   // Bind target socket to target socket (hierarchical bind)
00083   // - Binds both the export and the port
00084   //
00085   void bind(tlm_target_socket& s)
00086   {
00087     // export
00088     (*static_cast<export_type*>(this))(*static_cast<export_type*>(&s));
00089     // port
00090     s.mPort(mPort);
00091   }
00092 
00093   void operator() (tlm_target_socket& s)
00094   {
00095     bind(s);
00096   }
00097 
00098   //
00099   // Bind interface to socket
00100   // - Binds the interface to the export
00101   //
00102   void bind(fw_interface_type& ifs)
00103   {
00104     (*static_cast<export_type*>(this))(ifs);
00105   }
00106 
00107   void operator() (fw_interface_type& s)
00108   {
00109     bind(s);
00110   }
00111 
00112   //
00113   // Forward to 'operator->()' of port class
00114   //
00115   bw_interface_type* operator->()
00116   {
00117     return mPort.operator->();
00118   }
00119 
00120 protected:
00121   port_type mPort;
00122 };
00123 
00124 
00125 //
00126 // Convenience blocking and non-blocking socket classes
00127 //
00128 
00129 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00130           typename TYPES = tlm_generic_payload_types>
00131 class tlm_nb_target_socket :
00132   public tlm_target_socket <BUSWIDTH,
00133                             tlm_fw_nb_transport_if<TYPES>,
00134                             tlm_bw_nb_transport_if<TYPES> >
00135 {
00136 public:
00137   tlm_nb_target_socket(const char* name) :
00138     tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00139                       tlm_fw_nb_transport_if<TYPES>,
00140                       tlm_bw_nb_transport_if<TYPES> >(name)
00141   {
00142   }
00143 };
00144 
00145 template <unsigned int BUSWIDTH = 32,
00146           typename TYPES = tlm_generic_payload_types>
00147 class tlm_b_target_socket :
00148   public tlm_target_socket <BUSWIDTH,
00149                             tlm_fw_b_transport_if<TYPES>,
00150                             tlm_bw_b_transport_if >
00151 {
00152 public:
00153   tlm_b_target_socket(const char* name) :
00154     tlm_target_socket<BUSWIDTH,
00155                       tlm_fw_b_transport_if<TYPES>,
00156                       tlm_bw_b_transport_if >(name)
00157   {
00158   }
00159 };
